Coolum Beach Holiday Accommodation

Coolum at the Beach is an idyllic seaside getaway offering elegant, fully-furnished holiday apartments and lavish villas amidst a serene tropical paradise.

We are more than just a holiday destination. We are a tranquil coastal haven.

Escape the everyday hustle and bustle with us. Unwind and rejuvenate in our lush tropical gardens and enjoy our extensive resort amenities.

We provide a top-tier, cost-effective beach holiday experience with exceptional personalized service.

For your convenience, we are situated a short, easy stroll from the beach, shopping centers, and numerous restaurants and cafes.

Discover why so many guests consider Coolum at the Beach their home away from home.

We eagerly anticipate welcoming you and helping you create lasting holiday memories.

Things to do on your Coolum Beach Holiday

Explore beautiful beaches, national parks, delicious food and island adventures.

Book on this website. It's worth it!
